column4: does anyone ever have problems with ubuntu concerning headphones and speakers....sometimes when i pull my headphones out the speakers have no sound, other times my speakers will output while i have my headphones plugged in
and once in a while it works like it should
the odd thing is that it the problems are not consistent
you might have to change it as admin
language support is not a valid command
it says "starting administration" and then quits
no, and '--debug' shows that no password prompt found.
can you "set | grep -i pass" for me?  Maybe you have an environment set?
I'm using ubuntu classic, not the new one.
I'm re-installing french, we'll see if that work.s
